articles.title: TotalEnergies faces second lawsuit over Uganda oil projects
articles.description: Five activist groups have sued French oil major TotalEnergies for a second time over its projects in Uganda and Tanzania in a Paris civil court, they said on Tuesday, after an earlier fast-track attempt was dismissed in February.
articles.content:
Companies TotalEnergies SE Follow
